duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and conduct experiments to scale from laboratory to pilot or plant scale
Provide feedback and training to technicians for accurate data interpretation
Offer guidance and oversight on safe operation of lab facilities from a chemical handling and hygiene perspective
Utilize expertise in chemical engineering principles for homogeneous/heterogeneous catalysis, reaction engineering, and separation processes
Conduct catalyst characterization using SEM/EDS, BET surface area, and other relevant techniques
Apply process safety knowledge to handle toxic and flammable materials in Pilot Plant Operations
Model and analyze chemical processes using ASPEN and other appropriate tools
Identify new programs, experimental capabilities, and data analytical capabilities for process improvements
Utilize Advanced Data Analytics and AI/ML methods for process enhancement
